means: 漫无计划的，不被规则所束缚的，随心所欲的

sentence.Network_en: Bold as you please, she grabbed me by the sleeve.
sentence.Network_cn: 她真够大胆的，竟抓住了我的衣袖。

sentence.Network_en: You are at liberty to do as you please.
Well, if you don't want to study, do as you please.
sentence.Network_cn: 你要是不想学习, 那就请便吧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 早先的狐步舞，是一种随兴的舞（go-as-you-please），你爱怎么跳就怎么跳，没有特定的舞步，可依旋律随意婆娑起舞。它的舞步都 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(G) -亿城英语 ... go-around 回合 go-as-you-please 随心所欲的 go-between 中间人.
近似字词-新浪字典 ... go-around 回合 go-as-you-please 不拘束的,随意的 go-between 中间人.
9.19-9.25 ... As you please 随便（随你喜欢） Go-as-you-please 不受拘束的 2.Please： 满意；取悦.

list.key: Rent a car and go as you please
list.abs: Please ensure that you have paid and display 请确保您已经付费并请出示单据Rent a car and go as you please 租辆车就可随你便了Strictly no parking 严禁停车

RelatedPhrase.word: Come and go as you please

list.key: Come and go as you please
list.abs: Come and go as you please 你自如地来去  When you move with such ease 款款莲步轻移  Hey, I'd like to own you, 嗨,多想拥有你  But I won't.

means.word_mean: 1. not bound by rule or law or convention;

sentences.sentence: "bewildered by the old go-as-you-please liberty of alliterative rhythm"- George Saintsbury
